body_html: @szagoruyko Thanks. Maybe I am wrong, but the source code seems a bit confusing. The documentation of the function says "Currently only 2D and 3D padding supported", while the implementation suggests that "Only 4D and 5D padding is supported for now".
body_text: @szagoruyko Thanks. Maybe I am wrong, but the source code seems a bit confusing. The documentation of the function says "Currently only 2D and 3D padding supported", while the implementation suggests that "Only 4D and 5D padding is supported for now".
body: @szagoruyko Thanks. Maybe I am wrong, but the [source code](http://pytorch.org/docs/_modules/torch/nn/functional.html#pad) seems a bit confusing. The documentation of the function says "Currently only 2D and 3D padding supported", while the implementation suggests that "Only 4D and 5D padding is supported for now".
